title: Number of students in upper secondary education in Denmark 2008 to 2018
summary: In general Number of students has rose over the Year.
Number of students is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Number of students, of value 150608.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Number of students about 122837.0 was reached at Year 2009
